reviews.text: Nuestra experiencia con la mesera rita fue muy mala , nos trajo comida cruda , se olvid√≥ pedidos , nos habl√≥ de mala manera , no nos revolvi√≥ nada ‚Ä¶
Excelente todo, Rita nos dio una excelente atenci√≥n, me sent√≠ como en casa.
Rita es espectacular la mejor server, muy servicial, amable y eficiente! Merece un aumento üí™üèΩ

I love this place! I‚Äôm gonna give 4 starts this time because since I don‚Äôt live in NYC I try to stop by every time I‚Äôm in town for work and this time I did the same, wanted to get a puchero since it was a chilly and cloudy day. I waited for puchero day on their soup menu and when I got there they were ‚Äúout‚Äù of it. I believe it to be true of course, the sever was super nice and all but I think if you‚Äôre out of it, you make more. Especially if you‚Äôre are in the customer service industry, and especially with food. Flavor here is always good, a little overpriced but I think going there every one in a while is totally worth ir. I ended up just getting mbeju with cocido which was very tasty!
Excelente ambiente atenci√≥n en este lugar se pasa muy bien üëåüèæy los precios muy acorde a la excelente calidad de las comidas
Muy muy bueno

Really nice restaurant with a awesome vibe. They had a musician come by playing the harp and definitely made the highlight of the night. The chicken sandwiches were really good and the empanadas were really nice. I'd go back.

Sorry to give a poor review, but when I ask if the groundbeef and Yuca patty is made with onion and two wait staff explicitly say no, followed by me gagging on finely ground onion and the staff trying to say it's only scallions. No, sorry‚Ä¶
Really special place to eat! Great food, friendly atmosphere and live music. Everyone who works here that we interacted with was so kind, and the service was above and beyond. Food is very authentic.
It‚Äôs an incredible warm place, the atmosphere is so soothing, the service was amazing and the food even more. Every single dish is simply delicious and authentic Paraguayan flavor ‚ô•Ô∏è
Authentic Paraguay restaurant, love their empanadas and desserts
Rita gave us excellent service. I‚Äôm proud to live nearby and show off this great spot to all the family members that visit me, what a neighborhood gem this is. :)
Rica la parrilla
The place and food of this place is 10/10, i love the chipa and sopa, my sister eats from this place when she has time

Un lugar con aut√©ntico sabor paraguayo. Las empanadas est√°n deliciosas, los postres son excelentes y la cerveza muy buena. El ambiente es agradable, con una atenci√≥n muy amable y c√°lida. ¬°Sin duda, un pedacito de Paraguay en Nueva York que vale la pena visitar! üáµüáæ
Me encanta la comida paraguaya. Las empanadas son mis preferidas. Las chipas me encanta. Lugar agradable. La due√±a muy amable.

The restaurant offered a truly enjoyable dining experience from start to finish. The ambiance was warm and inviting, creating the perfect atmosphere for a relaxed meal. The service was impeccable, with attentive staff who were knowledgeable about the menu. Each paraguayan dish was prepared with skill and care, showcasing fresh ingredients and delightful flavors. Overall, the restaurant exceeded expectations, leaving a lasting positive impression.

This Paraguayan spot is awesome! The sopa paraguaya and Tallar√≠n are super tasty and filling. The vibe is cozy, and the staff are really friendly. Perfect place to try authentic Paraguayan food without any fuss. Great value for the quality.
Definitely coming back!

My very first time eating at I Love Paraguay restaurant and it was extremely wonderful to experience. I really loved the cocido and the food was amazing! I really loved the overall relaxing vibes and the beautiful decor of Paraguayan nature and the calming music of the place. It feels like a great getaway to relax and enjoy some time for yourself and even better if you bring along family and friends. Thank you very much for the amazing experience!!!
Ambiente, servicio, comida y ambiente lo maximo üëçüòÉ
La parrillada para dos es muy muy buena y no es nada caro. Recomiendo tambi√©n las sodas de su propia marca
Food was amazing and service was ever friendly and attentive . I definitely recommend stopping in for a bite to eat.

Visitar I Love Paraguay en Nueva York es como hacer un viaje directo al coraz√≥n de la gastronom√≠a paraguaya. La comida es simplemente espectacular: sabores aut√©nticos, porciones generosas y platos que transmiten tradici√≥n en cada bocado. Pero lo que realmente marca la diferencia es la atenci√≥n: un 100 de 100. El equipo recibe a cada cliente con calidez, amabilidad y un trato cercano que hace sentir como en casa. Sin duda, un lugar imprescindible para quienes quieran disfrutar de Paraguay en la Gran Manzana

The food is wonderful, with distinct authentic flavors. My server,
Rita, was incredibly kind and attentive, helping me with tasty recommendations:)
Lastimosamente tuve una mala experiencia con la mesera cuando reclame q estaba mala la empanada  sal√≠ decepcionada porque quiere conectarte con tu costumbre tu comida no recomer√≠a a nadie mas

Las empanadas estaban descompuestas. Luego pedimos si nos pod√≠an cambiar, y nos trajeron empanadas fr√≠as por dentro, y al tratar de hablar con la mesera se mostr√≥ sumamente hostil! Cero atenci√≥n al cliente, una pena!!!

Absolutely loved this place - everything from the food, to the service, to the homey local restaurant atmosphere was perfect. The chipa and cocido were delicious as are their empanadas. Our waitress Rita was such a sweetheart and so knowledgeable, would definitely come back! Saludos‚ù§Ô∏è

Rita was the best! It was our first time coming here and she was so nice to explain all the items, give great recommendations, and she was the nicest person. The food was bomb and I would 10000000% go back, this place is a 10/10.
Food was delicious and Rita was an amazing waitress!
Rita was amazing! And absolutely fashionable! Great service and beautiful dinning! Highly recommend the white sangria.
Pollo I love Paraguay was simply delicious. Empanadas were also amazing. Very cute spot
Mi restaurante favorito siempre ‚ù§Ô∏è
Delicious food at a very good price! Best empanadas in NYC. The passion fruit mousse was breathtaking!
Best place
La comida muy buena  excelente servicio
Love their empanadas
Rita es la mejor!
The Tres Leches will be the best thing you will ever put in your mouth
The tres leches is the best tres leches in NYC!!!
Sehr leckeres Essen. Sehr freundliche Bedienung und der Laden ist sehr gem√ºtlich.
Lovely place! Great food!

Delicious food with friendly service. The empanadas and the yucas were light and tasty. The cultet for two was more than enough for two. Everything wasn't greasy at all which I applaud.Sometimes you really wish the food wasn't as oily and this place delivered.

Other reviewers recommended the Chipa Guazu and I recommend it as well! It's like a creamy corn filled bread.

Highly recommend this restaurant.
Estuvo excelente el lugar, muy buena la comida, el ambiente muy tranquilo y tuvimos un excelente servicio por parte de la mesera que nos atendi√≥, Rita
Very good service, excellent food, and great flavor. We traveled from New Jersey just to eat there.

We had an amazing lunch at the restaurant, I‚Äôd honestly recommend anyone I know to ear here :)
We will be back!
Had such a great time! The food was amazing and Rita was the sweetest.
Incredible food, fantastic ambiance, and phenomenal service. I love this place
Wonderful friendly service, delicious food from a beautiful country ü©∑üáµüáæ
Excellent empanadas and delicious gnocchi.
very nice experience! Great food!

Very nice family owned restaurant in Sunnyside. They offer typical Paraguayan food and the prices are very decent. We shared the chipa guazu (cheese corn souffl√©), a mix of empanadas - beef, ham and cheese and chicken, the Picada de Carne y Chorizo and dessert and the food was delicious and more than enough for three people.

I never had Paraguay food and I am so happy to have tried this spot. They have DELICIOUS and fresh empanadas! My favorite is the spinach and cheese empanada. The beef with egg, chicken with egg, and cheese empanadas are AMAZING. They also have a mini empanadas sampler option with 3 croquettes. Definitely recommend coming here for empanadas. I am sure their other items on the menu are just as good.

I decided to go because of a friend recommendation and I‚Äôm so happy that I took  it, I mean, such a cozy authentic place! Food was delicious and I really felt connected with Paraguay‚Äôs culture, bunch of origin products and a well designed menu in my opinion. If anyone in New York wants to have a taste if Paraguay‚Äôs gastronomy this is the spot! And the best part was the service, Rita took care of my table and she was stunning, so radiant and clever on the suggestions. Had the guava alfajor after she recommended and I loved it! Thanks Rita!

First time having Paraguayan food. It was delicious! The waiter recommended we got the corn cake/souffl√© (chipa guazu) and I would too! They have a range of platters and dishes. Definitely will be coming back soon.

I visited this restaurant for the first time and ordered the milanesa with ham and cheese. It was absolutely delicious! The service was exceptional, with friendly and attentive staff, and the atmosphere was beautiful. To top it off, the tres leches was incredible‚Äîrich, flavorful, and perfectly balanced. Definitely worth it!

It was awesome! Lovely place, nice service and love the atmosphere with the jazz music in the background. I haven‚Äôt eat alfajores for a long time so finally try some here, the size is pretty big and was delicious. We got a traditional combo, a delicious soup for the day and the rice with meat which I expected the sauce to be more thinner, but still delicious.

Always great flavors, small place, comfy and cozy. As a Latino that love sweet desserts, I had try the famous "Tres Leches" cake around the world, and here Ive found the cake that is in the top 3 of them all! Please try it, even with a full belly, you won't be able to stop after the first taste. Sopa Paraguaya (the only dry soup in the world), and if you are Italian or into pastas, please try their Gnocchi with beef sauce and tell me if you didn't tear a little after you did...

Homey and cute vibes! Loved the decor and vibe, and plenty of customers! I tried the steamed yuca (simple but yummy!) and Guarana soda (berry like). My friends really enjoyed the empanadas appetizers and I Love Paraguay curry chicken platter. Definitely would revisit to try more dishes!

I highly recommend this beautiful and amazing restaurant to all of my friends. I cannot stop raving about how delicious and authentic their food is! It is top on my list of favorite restaurants of all time that I have been to and have tried so many! This place never disappoints and the food is beyond incredible! A must try! Not only is the food great but the atmosphere takes me to another place where I don‚Äôt even feel like I am in NyC anymore but like I stepped into a quaint little shop in Paraguay, it‚Äôs like going on a mini vacation! The decor is so cute and peaceful and they always have nice music to set the mood. The service is always friendly and very accommodating. Really I could not ask for more! Thank you, I love Paraguay!!! My family and I love you! ‚ù§Ô∏è
Small but beautiful spot serving traditional food. Very cozy, always clean. Takeaway or dine-in.

Estuve almorzando all√≠ hace un par de semanas. Realmente la comida es muy sabrosa y con sabor t√≠picamente paraguayo. No s√© c√≥mo lo hacen pero lo logran. Volv√≠ al d√≠a siguiente para llevar algunos productos t√≠picos y sin gluten, as√≠ como empanadas. 10 de 10. Es f√°cilmente accesible, pues est√° a mitad de camino entre Manhattan y Flushing por la l√≠nea 7 del subte, en la parada de la calle 46- Bliss, y de all√≠ a no m√°s de 300 mts por Greenpoint Av.
El lugar es acogedor y bien ambientado, y la atenci√≥n excelente. La guinda de la torta es que ahora ofrecen cerveza artesanal muy buena de su propia marca.

At the time of the visit, the restaurant was empty, so we were seated almost immediately. Accommodated us with a booster seat but it all went downhill after that.

The waiter was inattentive (asked for two glasses of water, only brought one), did not serve sauces that were supposed to be given with the platter that was ordered, it was very difficult to get his attention to provide this and then a new waiter took over mid way.

Ordered a beef and chicken empanada which was tasty. Ordered a platter which came with pieces of Yuka fries, chorizo, beef pieces and french fries. The chorizo was salty and overcooked while the French fries were so dry (hence us needing these sauces!)

Also ordered the Yuka and beef patty and spaghetti and chicken.

Overall, the food was meh (except for the empanadas -those were good)
Price-decent
Service-poor

Hace rato que vengo ac√° de vez en cuando con amigos, y cada vez que vengo, la paso bien y la comida es buen√≠sima.

Las picadas tienen suficiente comida para dos personas.  La tradicional es muy buena, pero me gusta mas la de empanadas.

Servicio viene al apretar de un botoncito, y los que atienden son muy amables.

En mi opini√≥n, todo lo de este restor√°n es ejemplar y no muy caro.  Espero venir muchas veces mas üôèüôè.
Such a beautiful small restaurant. The food was amazing, the staff was lovely. Everything sounded so good we even took some home

Excelente lugar para comer comida paraguaya!!
Me encantan los asados, yo prob√© el platito de choclo y una parrillada para 2 (as√≠ se llama) y aunque en realidad √©ramos tres personas no nos lo pudimos acabar, era basto y lo pusimos para llevar, recomiendo much√≠simo las sodas paraguayas de naranja, la torta de tres leches no tiene madre est√° buen√≠simaüíúüíúüíú

Una de las experiencias m√°s lindas! Record√© todo lo que implicaba juntarse con mi familia a compartir un asado ‚ô•Ô∏è
La comida est√° espectacular, los mozos s√∫per atentos y amables, tuvimos hasta m√∫sica en vivo, polca, tango y m√∫sica contempor√°nea.
Hac√≠a 3 a√±os quer√≠a conocer este lugar, y sin duda me fui muy feliz de haberlo hecho.
Les comiendo que vayan, eso si los domingos con reserva.

Si buscas probar la cocina paraguaya este es tu sitio.
Estaba todo riqu√≠simo, la chipa, la picada con diferentes entrantes t√≠picos, as√≠ como la carne del asado. Las cantidades son muy generosas para el precio que tienen.
Adem√°s la atenci√≥n del personal fue muy atentan y amable y te explican cualquier duda que tengas.
Volveremos la pr√≥xima vez que vengamos a NY!!

Interesting food and restaurant. There is a guy with a harp serenading random tables which is a unique experience. The meats and cheesy bread are all pretty solid picks. Great restaurant for a bunch of hungey diners.

This is my favorite restaurant in queens New York, the place is very clean and nice, the food is excellent, we like to do the tea party sometimes and go and have the parrilla steak to share , the empanadas are the best is so good and tasty, the juices are natural fruit, desserts are the best . I highly recommend this nice restaurant. Price are reasonable and staff are very nice and professional. Located in Queens New York .

This was my first time trying Paraguayan food though I do love a good empanada and they offer an assortment of local varieties here. Started off though with a chips gauzu and it was so good - a wonderful cakey combo of fresh corn and cheese. Then came an assortment of empanadas - nicely presented with little stamps on the parchment to indicate which was which. Nice touch! They were all good though I‚Äôd say the cheese and hearts of palm was my favorite. Service was friendly and the place has a nice homey vibe. I look forward to coming back and trying more.

Very small place. The food was very good. Steak was cooked perfectly. Sangria was also good, not too sweet. Beef Empanadas were excellent. The star of the show was the tres leche cake. So moist, & delicious. Went for a friend's birthday, she is from Paraguay & misses the food. She said it was very authentic just like home.

The food here is exceptional! Very tasty and well prepared and you can chose among many options on the menu.The food can‚Äôt get better and the prices are fair for the portion size.
Always a great spot to get great food. I will recommend to go and try every meal, specially the ‚Äútraditional‚Äù ones. The Paraguayan empanadas are the best in the whole world and they have it there.
The whole experience from start to finish is great. The waitress is always super friendly and kind, also the owners are often there and they share their stories with you giving you a more personalized experience there. (A truly entrepreneur family)
Friendly service and large portions make this quaint, homey spot well worth a visit.

Wonderful place to go with family, portions are large and filling. Service is friendly but sometimes can take a bit of a while due to busy days etc. Overall, my parents really enjoyed it and I will definitely be back.

It's very good. The empanadas are delicious and the food is all cooked from scratch. Service wise, they forgot a dish we ordered on a light day and these things matter. Not a deal breaker but we may give it another go again.

I ordered the skirt steak. It was amazing. It came with mashed potatoes in an extremely hot little pot. I couldn't wait so I burned my mouth....
No regrets.
No tangible menu, not my fav but not a deal breaker. I would go there again.
Got the chicken curry and platter for apps and really tasty all around. The vibes was cute as well.

My first time at this restaurant. And my first time eating Paraguayan food. And it definitely won‚Äôt be my last. We had the delicious Milanese plate for two and also sopa paraguayo. Good service too.
